data.name: Data Usage
data.description: View and monitor your data usage

markdown.markdownText: #### Data Usage Dashboard This dashboard displays your account's data usage, counted towards your team daily quota. If no data appears, you may need to [activate](https://coralogix.com/docs/data-usage-metrics/) the data usage metrics feature. If the feature has been activated, you may delete this markdown message by using the delete in the options menu in the upper right corner.
